table.name: vtiger_buildingplan
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_buildingplan` ( `buildingplanid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `buildingplan_no` VARCHAR(32) DEFAULT NULL, `assesment_no` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `fullname` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`buildingplanid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_buildingplancf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_buildingplancf` ( `buildingplanid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`buildingplanid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
